```{r setup, include=FALSE}
rm(list=ls())
graphics.off()
```

```{r packages, message=FALSE}
require(fpp3)
require(tidyquant)
require(stargazer)
require(kableExtra)
```

```{r load_data}
# Use tidyquant function tq_get to gather data from FRED
fred_data <- tq_get("LBSSA12",
                    get = "economic.data",
                    from = "1976-01-01",
                    to   = "2019-12-01") %>%
  mutate(Month = yearmonth(date), value = price) %>%
  select(-c(date, price)) %>%
  as_tsibble(index = Month, key = symbol)
# Visualize the raw data stored in fred_data using autoplot
fred_data %>%
  autoplot(value) +
  labs(x = "Date", y = "Percent") +
  ggtitle("Florida Labor Force Participation Rate")
```
